alert.note: Alert for Everett and Vicinity; Seattle and Vicinity (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 12:26PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kitsap...southwestern Snohomish and northwestern King Counties through 100 PM PDT... At 1226 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edmonds, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Everett, Edmonds, Lynnwood, Mukilteo, Mountlake Terrace, Mill Creek, Shoreline, Richmond Highlands, Paine Field-Lake Stickney, Kingston, Martha Lake, Harbour Pointe, Esperance, Seattle Hill-Silver Firs and West Lake Stevens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Everett and Vicinity; Seattle and Vicinity
